resources.string: A modplayer that plays over 90 mainstream and obscure module formats, including Protracker (MOD), Scream Tracker 3 (S3M), Fast Tracker II (XM) and Impulse Tracker (IT).
The directory where mod files are located
Set the default mixing pan separation

• Performance optimizations
• Instrument highlight
• Delete files from file list
• Remove deleted files from playlists
 
Version 2.2.0:
• Player interface changes
• Fix AMF module loading
• Fix IT215 sample loading
• Fix OctaMED tempo settings
• Fix OctaMED note limits
 
Version 2.1.1:
• Modules can be enqueued from file list
• Pause playback on incoming phone call
• Prevent crash on module seek
• Prevent crash on invalid thread
 
Version 2.1.0:
• Fix Startrekker Packer loader
• Modules can be added to play queue
• Fix pause button state on reconnection
• Code refactor
 
Version 2.0.3:
• Display song index
• Clean up stale player service
 
Version 2.0.2:
• Fix module restart on application reopen
Set the pan separation for the channel mixer:
Install example music files when creating modules directory
Set the type of volume bars
Play files again after playlist ends
Long press modules to create new playlists or add to existing playlists. Long press playlists for more options.
Based on xmp %s written by Claudio Matsuoka and Hipolito Carraro Jr.
